DataElement.preferredName: Modified Severity Weighted Assessment Tool (mSWAT) Percent Change From Baseline Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A computed percent of change from the starting point to the current assessment using the modified severity weighted assessment tool (mSWAT).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Severity Weighted Assessment Tool (mSWAT) Percent Change From Baseline
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._A standard from which a judgment concerning an event severity can be established._The relative importance granted to something._Any one of several evaluation/assessment tools used to ascertain a patient's condition or diagnosis._A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._A starting point to which things may be compared.
